We empower you,

you empower the world

Teleport scales local solutions to tackle global problems.

About us:

Teleport is an association of professionals from different fields solving the problems of non–profit organizations, community interest companies and governments in crisis situations.

Our main goal is to identify and eliminate problems that arise in conditions of high stress/high intensity, so that humanitarian workers and volunteers can focus on their mission and reach their goals faster.

What have we already done?

  • stopped human trafficking

  • launched volunteer training programs

  • created several sustainable refugee security systems

  • built some of the most high-tech reception points for refugees

  • accelerated the work of volunteers and organizations

  • made more transparent money tracking systems for donors

  • developed a system for transparent delivery of humanitarian
    aid to humanitarian warehouses to Ukraine.

Find out more about our work below.

Cases:

Przemysl Tesco: Birthplace of Teleport.

The city of Przemyśl opened the emergency refugee help center at the abandoned TESCO supermarket. During the first days of the war in Ukraine, they needed the support of volunteers to set up the management processes workflow in the shortest time possible. Reducing the load on this center was our main purpose.

Chelm Tesco: Establishing a new displacement center from the ground up.

The city of Chelm administrators invited our team to conduct a consultation before opening a new refugee help center starting from zero at the abandoned TESCO supermarket. The center was planned and opened within one week by our IT cooperation with Monday.com.

Lublin Help Ukraine Center: Developing a warehouse management system to provide security and raise efficiency.

We got in touch with the Help Ukraine Center located in Lublin when the refugee crisis started being containable enough and offered to help them update their processes into more technically advanced versions in order to make it more efficient and secure.

Donate

Teleport relies on donations to function. All funds collected will be used to cover operational costs and expenses. To assure maximum transparency, all transactions conducted over our accounts will be publicly available.

Teleport fundraisers are used to support organizations that were audited and vetted beforehand, to assure maximum efficiency of collected funds.

DONATE request support

Request Support:

We offer our support to any non profit organization or community interest company.

If you need help with fundraising, marketing, management or anything else business and IT related, were here for you.

We can offer you a variety of services.

If its help with fundraising, help with marketing yourself better to potential patrons, implementing a digital workspace for your organization or consulting you in management related tasks, we stop at nothing to make it happen.

Are you a non profit
organization or a community interest company and requires support?

We're here to help! Please use this form to introduce yourself to us and tell us a little bit about your problems. Don't worry, if you're unsure and just feel stuck, we will do our best to find out whats wrong and how to solve it!

Are you looking for a way to support Ukraine with your work but can't just drop everything and relocate that easily?

Teleport is always looking for additional help in the fields: Marketing, Design, Coding / Programming etc. If you would like to join us and take on all kinds of projects from the comfort of your own home, contact us and we will surely put you to work.
